Class: FluentDOM

WinJSContrib.UI. FluentDOM

new FluentDOM(nodeType, className, parentElt, parent)

Utility class for building DOM elements through code with a fluent API

Parameters:
Name Type Description
nodeType string

type of DOM node (ex: 'DIV')
className

css classes
parentElt

parent DOM element
parent WinJSContrib.UI.FluentDOM

parent FluentDOM
Source:
  • winjscontrib.core.js, line 1997
Example
var elt = new WinJSContrib.UI.FluentDOM('DIV', 'item-content')
   .text(item.title)
   .display('none')
   .element;
